# [IMPROVEMENT] Add Error Boundaries

**Labels**: enhancement, frontend, error-handling, medium

---

## Description
Implement React Error Boundaries for graceful error handling.

## Current State
No error boundaries implemented - errors crash the entire app.

## Solution
Add error boundaries at:
- App level (catch all errors)
- Page level (isolate page errors)
- Component level (for complex components)

## Priority
**MEDIUM** - Improves application resilience.
